title: PSA: Some people play other game modes than SR as their primary mode
body:
Because of this, people like me who play 3v3 most of the time have yo go out of our way to play 5v5 to farm mastery points. This often leads to a disconnect between which champs are listed as 'highest mastery' on a profile and which champions are actually the most played overall or recently, when it comes to someone who doesn't play SR as their primary mode.

Case in point, I can count on one hand the average amount of riven games I play in a week, and haven't played lux in maybe a month - but you would wrongly assume that I spam them nonstop by looking at my champion profile.

As an added annoyance, champions who are at rank 5 mastery but don't make it into your top 3 mysteriously vanish altogether from your mastery list when viewed in the profile for some reason - which makes mastery points on a profile even less accurate than they would otherwise be at showing how often someone plays certain champs.

The only one of my top 3 mastery champs that I play regularly is fiora, and she's listed as number 3 because, again, 3v3 doesn't give mastery points (not even in ranked 3s teams).
